snippet: Winter’s fierce grip was finally broken early this week, and people reacted by shedding their puffy coats and pouring into the parks for lunch.
abstract: Bill Cunningham captures photos of fashionable New Yorkers enjoying the warmer weather.
lead_paragraph: Winter’s fierce grip was finally broken early this week, and people reacted by shedding their puffy coats and pouring into the parks for lunch.

headline.main: Bill Cunningham | The Return of Happy Days
headline.print_headline: The Return of the Happy Days
